title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 586.7 - Amendments to rules (marcy campus)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 586.7 - Amendments to rules (marcy campus)

State Regulations
(a) "Campus Drive" will be the name for the
main campus road. (b) "Service

Drive" will be the name of the service road. This road will be a two-way
roadway restricted to college maintenance and service vehicles. The speed limit
will be 15 MPH. (c) "Governor

Horatio Seymour Road" will be the name of the main campus entrance road that
terminates at the cul-de-sac in front of the ALC building. There is absolutely
no parking on this road. Its primary use is for bus pickup/drop-off. All
vehicles will keep right when entering the cul-de-sac. (d) "Residential Drive" will be the name of
the roadway connecting (North) Campus Drive with (South) Campus

Drive. (e) Parking lots will be
named: (1)

Parking Lot A; (2)

Parking Lot B; (3)

Parking Lot C; (4)

Parking Lot D; (5)

Parking Lot E; (6)

Parking Lot F; (7)

Parking Lot G; (8)

Parking Lot H; (9)

Parking Lot I; (10)

Parking Lot J; (11)

Parking Lot K; (12)

Parking Lot L; and
(13)

Parking Lot M. (f) Handicap individuals must park within
designated handicap areas of the lots. (g) Visitor parking will primarily be in

Parking Lots B, E, F and J. Vehicles parked outside of the designated visitor
spaces must be registered with Public Safety and display a valid registration
decal or must display a visitor/guest pass. (h) Driving on any of the pedestrian walks on
the campus is a violation of this Part. Emergency vehicles or college
maintenance vehicles are exempt from this Part. (i) Drivers are required to obey the
instructions conveyed by traffic control devices. Failure to obey these
instructions is a violation of the New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law. (1)

The following intersections are STOP
intersections: (i) exits from the service
road to Residential Drive and Campus Drive; (ii)
junction of the Campus Drive and

Governor Horatio Seymour Road; vehicles traveling on Campus Drive are required
to stop before crossing or entering Governor Horatio Seymour Road; (iii)
intersection of Flanagan Road and

Campus Drive; vehicles exiting Flanagan Road are required to stop; (iv)
intersection of Flanagan Road and

Mulaney Road; vehicles exiting from Flanagan Road are required to
stop; (v) intersection of Campus

Drive and Edic Road; vehicles exiting Campus Drive are required to
stop; (vi)
intersection of

Residential Drive and Campus Drive (north end); (vii)
intersection with Residential Drive and

Campus Drive (south end); (viii)
exit from south end of Lot I to Residential Drive; (ix)
entrance to north end of Lot H from

Residential Drive; (x) intersection
of Campus Drive and Flanagan Road when traveling east on Campus

Drive; (xi)
intersection of Campus

Drive and Flanagan Road when traveling west on Campus Drive; (xii)
all exits from K, L and M Lots to

Flanagan Road; (xiii)
entrance to K
and L lots from Flanagan Road; and
(xiv)
exit from L Lot going north. (2)

The following intersections
are YIELD intersections: (i) exit from Lot A
to Campus Drive; (ii)
exit from Lot
B to Campus Drive and exit from Lot B to Governor Horatio Seymour

Road; (iii)
exit from Lot C to

Governor Horatio Seymour Road and exit from Lot C to Campus Drive; (iv)
all exits from Lot D to Campus

Drive; (v) all exits from Lot E to

Campus Drive; (vi)
all exits from

Lot F to Campus Drive; (vii)
exit
from Lot G to Residential Drive; (viii)
all exits from Parking Lots H and I to

Residential Drive; and
(ix)
all
exits from Lot J to Residential Drive. (3)

The following are ONE WAY roadways: (i) exit roadway south end of Parking Lot I
to Residential Drive; and
(ii)
entrance roadway to north end of Parking Lot H from Residential

Drive. Notes
